Type.Name: WidgetHelpType

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed WidgetHelpType extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: The type of help to display when the event is raised.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.WidgetHelpType Tooltip = int32(0)

Docs.summary: This value shows the short name of the tooltip--- the hover text.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.WidgetHelpType WhatsThis = int32(1)

Docs.summary: This field holds longer or more detailed help text; so named because it's often used by the "What's this?" help function in many applications.
